notes.creator: Sam

notes.notes: I disagree, but I agree it should have hexproof

notes.notes: No it should be colorless // The ultimate meme card

notes.creator: Thys
notes.notes: I guess it could work as a sorcery, but I feel like the end '2 life less' thing is an artifact

notes.creator: Sam
notes.notes: Or we could make it gain you a ton of life, and avoid adding a permanent necessary clause to it

notes.notes: I don't love the gain a bunch of life approach tbh, I think it being a permanent advantage is good

notes.notes: we'll stick with that // i want to talk about making a token tho // since the effect is very much a spell or a challenge

notes.notes: mayyyyybe it could give an emblem

notes.notes: or just maybe like, make an artifact token with hexproof and indestructible that has the same effect // or just an emblem lol

{T}: Add {C}
{T}, Take a shot: Add {B}{B}

notes.creator: Sam
notes.notes: also, changed the new from brewing spire to Decoction tower, as i thought brewing spire was a really lame name lol. Decoction is the process of taking half of the mash and boiling it again before adding it back to the batch. It felt kind of like beer making eugenics which aligns with Yawgmoth and the phyrexians

Exile all opponents' graveyards. You may cast spells from among those cards this turn, and mana of any type can be spent to cast them. At the beginning of the next end step, if any of those cards remain exiled, return them to their owners' graveyards.
Exile ~.

name: Return to Soil
text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land. If a land was destroyed this way, its controller may search their library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Otherwise, its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

name: Enti, the Worldshaker
text:
~ enters with nine beer counters on it.
Remove one beer counter from ~: Target creature gains trample, vigilance, and haste until end of turn.
Remove two beer counters from ~: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Remove five beer counters from ~: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

notes.creator: Thys
notes.notes: The turtle mythic itself. All names need to be reduced to name without title

name: Return to the Earth
text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.

name: Nepenthe, Titan of Mind's Deisre
text:
When ~ enters, sacrifice it unless it escaped.
Whenever ~ enters or attacks, each player mills three cards, then exile target nonland card from a graveyard. You may cast it this turn by exiling two cards from your graveyard in addition to paying its other costs, and mana of any type can be spent to cast that spell. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.
Escape - {U}{U}{B}{B}, Exile five other cards from your graveyard.

notes.notes: Added card json from backpacking trip

name: Inalla, Archmage Ritualist
text:
Eminence — Whenever another nontoken Wizard you control enters, if Inalla, Archmage Ritualist is in the command zone or on the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that Wizard. The token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
Tap five untapped Wizards you control: Target player loses 7 life.

notes.notes: Added proxy with art given by Sam
